name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern SD45 High Hoods Loco
summary: The popular EMD SD45 is now available for Train Simulator 2021 in three recognizable liveries of the Norfolk Southern Railway. Built between 1965 and 1971, the EMD SD45 was most at home hauling high-speed freight and intermodal services, although could occasionally be seen at the head of some passenger services.
